title: Wild Ties Yellow Microfiber Tie | Alphabet Necktie
description: Teach in style with this educational men's necktie from The American Necktie Company. Featuring the alphabet A-Z in upper and lower case cursive, this great necktie would make for the perfect fall accessory for any teacher, new or old, looking to bring new light into the worlds of their students. Imported.
